featured.text: It was initially created as a type of dance and ritual.
Originated in Japan, these hotels were initially meant for business professionals to stay close to populated business districts without spending a lot.
Initially Velcro did not fare well.
I asked how she dealt with the realization that she’d never walk again, and she confessed that initially she didn’t want to face it.

definition.example: Initially, I thought the project would be easy.
